an9.2:1.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an9.2:1.3: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu nissayasampanno hotī”ti?
an9.2:1.4: “Saddhañce, bhikkhu, bhikkhu nissāya akusalaṃ pajahati kusalaṃ bhāveti, pahīnamevassa taṃ akusalaṃ hoti.
an9.2:1.8: paññañce, bhikkhu, bhikkhu nissāya akusalaṃ pajahati kusalaṃ bhāveti, pahīnamevassa taṃ akusalaṃ hoti.
an9.2:1.9: Taṃ hissa bhikkhuno akusalaṃ pahīnaṃ hoti suppahīnaṃ, yaṃsa ariyāya paññāya disvā pahīnaṃ.
an9.2:2.1: Tena ca pana, bhikkhu, bhikkhunā imesu pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāya cattāro upanissāya vihātabbā.
an9.2:2.3: Idha, bhikkhu, bhikkhu saṅkhāyekaṃ paṭisevati, saṅkhāyekaṃ adhivāseti, saṅkhāyekaṃ parivajjeti, saṅkhāyekaṃ vinodeti.
an9.2:2.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhu, bhikkhu nissayasampanno hotī”ti.
